item.title: The whole of Westdown Gardens Road is in a terrible state as is Hewlett Road roundabout junction off the mini roundabout, 15th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 6, Westdown Gardens, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
